weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm white and cold. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I'm often seen in winter.
⛄ You can make a snowman out of me.
🗻 I'm frozen water.

weather.question: I am hot and yellow and give you light. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I can be seen during the day.
☀️ Plants need me to grow.
😎 You wear sunglasses when I'm very bright.

weather.question: I come in many colors after a rain shower. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I'm an arc.
✨ I need the sun and rain to appear.
🍀 It is rumored there is gold at my end

weather.question: I'm a big, white fluffy thing that floats in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I can look like animals.
🌬️ The wind moves me around.
💧 I am made of water droplets.

weather.question: I am water falling from the sky. Sometimes I drizzle, sometimes I pour. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ I make puddles.
🌧️ You need an umbrella when I fall.
💧 I start as a cloud.

weather.question: I can be gentle or fierce, and I make the leaves dance in the trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can blow your hat off.
💨 You can fly a kite with me.
🌳 I move the branches of trees.

weather.question: I rumble and flash, and I often come with heavy rain. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I can be scary.
⛈️ I involve thunder.
🔊 You can hear me before you see me sometimes.

weather.question: I am a swirling column of air that can cause a lot of damage. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I look like a funnel.
🏠 It's best to take shelter when I'm around.
💨 I am a powerful rotating wind.

weather.question: I am a thick fog that freezes on surfaces. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I form ice crystals.
🌫️ I make everything white and frosty.
🚗 Driving is difficult when I am present.

weather.question: I am a large, swirling storm that forms over warm ocean waters. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I have an eye.
🌀 I bring strong winds and heavy rain.
🛰️ People use satellites to track me.

food.question: I am yellow, long, and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I grow on trees in warm places
💛 My peel is the same color as the sun
📏 I'm often curved and easy to hold

food.question: I am round and juicy, and come in many colors like red, green, or yellow. I grow on trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 Snow White liked one of me.
🥧 You can make a pie with me!
🍎 A popular saying mentions me and doctors.

food.question: I am a vegetable that makes you cry when you cut me. I have many layers. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 Some people like me in soup.
💜 My skin is papery.
😭 I have a strong smell that can make your eyes water.

food.question: I am white and fluffy, and I'm often served with butter or jam. You can make sandwiches with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 You can make toast with me.
🥪 People use me for lunch!
🌾 I am made from wheat.

food.question: I am a sweet treat that is cold and creamy. I come in many flavors. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I am very popular in the summer.
🍨 I often come in a cone or cup.
🥶 Eating too much gives you brain freeze.

food.question: I am a small, green vegetable that grows in a pod. Some people don't like eating me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I grow in gardens.
💚 I am often served as a side dish.
🫛 Some people think I taste best with butter.

food.question: I am a popular dish made with a sauce and often served with meatballs or vegetables. I come in many shapes. What am I?

hints.text: 🍝 You might use a fork to eat me!
🍅 Tomato sauce is often paired with me.
🇮🇹 I am very popular in Italy.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy skin and a juicy, tangy taste. I am green on the inside and brown on the outside. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I grow on a vine.
🥄 You might need a spoon to eat me.
🇨🇳 I came from China.

food.question: I am made from milk, but I'm not liquid. I can be hard or soft, and I am often eaten with crackers. What am I?

hints.text: 🐭 A mouse's favorite snack!
🧀 I can be yellow, white, or orange.
🍕 I am often found on pizza.

food.question: I am a spice made from the bark of a tree. I am often used in desserts and have a warm, sweet flavor. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I smell wonderful around the holidays.
🍪 I am often used in cookies and pies.
🍁 I am found in Cinnamon Rolls
